properties.areaDesc: Goshen County; South Laramie Range Foothills; Sierra Madre Range; South Laramie Range; Snowy Range
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 2 at 2:17AM MST until February 4 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...SIGNIFICANT SNOW ACCUMULATIONS EXPECTED SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH
MONDAY FOR EAST CENTRAL THROUGH SOUTH CENTRAL WYOMING...

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Snowy and Sierra Madre
Ranges expecting to experience 12 to 20 inches on north facing
slopes.

* WHERE...Southeast Wyoming east of Interstate 25 to the Nebraska
state line...as well as the Interstate 80 Corridor between
Cheyenne and Laramie.

* WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 5 PM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY
